summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Housing Finance Corporation (DHFC) will hold a regular meeting on April 16, 2024, at 12:00 PM at Dallas City Hall and via videoconference. The purpose of the meeting is to discuss and make decisions regarding housing finance initiatives, including the approval of resolutions related to multifamily residential developments.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the February 13, 2024, meeting.
2. Action items concerning the West Virginia Apartments development, including:
   - Approval of a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) for financing, acquisition, and rehabilitation.
   - Transfer of DHFC West Virginia GP, LLC to the Corporation.
   - Creation of two new limited liability companies: DHFC West Virginia Developer, LLC and DHFC West Virginia Landowner, LLC.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a review of the DHFC Treasurerâ€™s report for the period ending February 29, 2024, and a pipeline report on ongoing projects as of April 5, 2024. Staffing updates will also be provided.

**Action Items**:  
The Corporation seeks approval for the MOU and the establishment of the new limited liability companies, as well as the transfer of the existing company to the Corporation. Public comments will be welcomed on agenda items IV-VIII. 

This meeting aims to facilitate the development and management of affordable housing initiatives in Dallas, ensuring community engagement and transparency.
